class.name: Christopher Hill
class.aboutMe: I've been a carpenter, an artist, and an electrician. I am a father and a husband. I love programming, because it allows me to create and learn continuously.

class.name: Tyler Daniel
class.aboutMe: Things I enjoy: sports (I play in a wood bat baseball league and a weekly basketball league), movies/tv (only good tv, though!), technology, food, traveling, video games, power lifting, food, beer, learning things on Youtube, and food.

class.name: Mike Meadows
class.aboutMe: Mike is a former scientist looking to convert his passion for logic into programming.  Also, he is a big fan of talking about himself in third person.

class.name: Jack Mocherman
class.aboutMe: I am within 5 feet of music, books, code, coffee, or some combination of the four at any given time!

class.name: Dominic Serrano
class.aboutMe: When I am not programming or learning more about my current project, I enjoy playing ping-pong, soccer, and sampling craft beers.
